data.description: We are seeking a dynamic and highly-motivated Product Management Intern to join our team for summer 2026! This role provides an outstanding opportunity for a proactive individual keen on gaining practical experience in product management and making a meaningful contribution to our business. Key Responsibilities: 1. Program Management: As an integral part of our team, you will help manage product program projects, ensuring they run smoothly, on time, and within budget. 2. Product Development: Work closely with our team in the development of innovative product features and enhancements. Your contribution will help shape our product offerings based on customer needs and market trends. 3. Market Research: Undertake comprehensive market research. Your insights will help us understand our competitive landscape, identify market opportunities, and make informed decisions on product improvements. 4.
